title: 'Good'
body: 'Fabric is good but stiching is not good.threads are coming out from everywhere'

body: 'The white legging is see through. You can only wear it under a long kurta. Very thin fabric. Not acceptable.'

title: 'Difference in Length'
body: 'One leg length is small ad another is long. What kind of product is this??'

title: 'Soft Legging'

title: 'The product is much better than i expected
rating: it gives a clean look yet so comfortable'
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''The product is much better than i expected it gives a a clean look yet so comfortable.'

title: 'Color is fading after every wash'
body: 'Fitting is ok but after every wash color is fading.  Not recommended.'

title: 'soft and comfortable'
body: 'really like these legging. they are soft as well as comfortable. no bleeding and fading of color till now. i use them as daily wear ones and tgey never give me any issue. wash them regularly with my regular clothes. till now they have retained their elasticity and color is same as new one. no issue of vloth bubbling as i use them regular and machine wash them'

title: 'Comfortable'
body: 'Its really soft and comfy materialonly concern is the tight fitting at the bottom hemit could have a little ease.otherwise its great'

title: Didn't like the material
body: 'Material is thin. Also it is a churidaar legging not an ankle length legging.'

title: 'Very disappointed'
body: I don't think it's original Lyra.. it says free size but it's too small. Infact while trying it for the first time I found the stitches are loose and coming out.. really very disappointing

title: Fabric is of very poor quality. Don't buy
'Very good product...'
body: It's a very good product...My wife is very satisfied with the stuff...

title: 'Faulty stitching'
body: 'When I got the product it looked fine. But after first wash(hand wash not even machine wash) I saw the stitching is very poor and one side stitch was open. It was very disappointing from a brand like lux Lyra.'

title: 'Perfect fit.. Loved it'
body: 'Thank you Amazon for providing best seller..'
